Kisan Credit Card provides sufficient and timely credit to farmers. It is a flexible and simplified procedure, adopting whole farm approach, including short-term, medium-term and long-term credit needs of borrowers for agriculture and allied activities and a reasonable component for consumption need.

Advantages of Kisan credit Card:

(a) A simplified procedure for credit to farmers, a large number of whom are illiterate or poorly educated

(b) No need to apply for loan every year as KCC provides the farmers with a credit facility on ongoing basis or revolving credits;

(c) It allows the farmers to buy seeds, fertilizers and other inputs as per his needs;

(d) Repayment can be done after harvest period and thus farmer finds it easier to settle the loan by selling his produce

(e) There is a flexibility of withdrawal of funds from any branch even when he wants to purchase of agricultural inputs

Eligibility:

Farmers - Individuals/Joint borrowers (owner cultivators) 
SHGs or Joint Liability Groups of Farmers including tenant farmers 
Assesment of Loan Limit

Loan limit is based on borrower's area of land in acres

Scale of finance

In every succesive years limit is increased by 10% upto 5 years therefore the limit of fifth year is about 150% of first year

PAIS(Personnel Accident Insurance Scheme) and NAIS(National agriculture insurance Scheme) for KCC Holders
to apply for the loan

Please visit nearest branch of purvanchal bank
